doc:
Marc Thompson (voice actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marc_Thompson_(voice_actor) 0 Marc Thompson (born May 20, 1975) is an American voice actor who has worked for 4Kids Entertainment, NYAV Post and DuArt Film and Video. Some of his major roles include Kevin Thompson, Anthony DeMartino, Timothy O'Neill in Daria. He is notable for voicing Robocar Poli. He voices Casey Jones in the 2003 version of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles cartoons and video games. He is the narrator of numerous Star Wars audio books including the Legacy of the Force and Fate of the Jedi series. He earned his BFA from New York University's Tisch School of the Arts in 1997. Marc_Thompson ( born May_20_,_1975 ) is an_American_voice_actor who has_worked for 4Kids_Entertainment , NYAV_Post and DuArt_Film_and_Video . Some of his_major_roles include Kevin_Thompson , Anthony_DeMartino , Timothy_O'Neill in Daria . He is notable for voicing Robocar_Poli . He voices Casey_Jones in the_2003_version of the_Teenage_Mutant_Ninja Turtles cartoons and video_games . He is the_narrator of numerous_Star_Wars_audio_books including the_Legacy of the_Force_and_Fate of the_Jedi_series . He earned his_BFA from New_York_University 's_Tisch_School of the_Arts in 1997 .
